content: this simple crochet baby blanket is easy to follow along and great for beginning crocheters to use for their very first crocheted afghans please note that my instructions for changing are different from the original pattern the stitching is the same regardless of how long your chain is if you change the length of the chain it will change how much yarn you will need this is simple baby blanket 1 on yarnspirations 1 http //www yarnspirations com/patterns/simple-baby-blanket-1 html
